metadata.title: CVE-2022-39832 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in PSPP 1.6.2. There is a heap-based buffer overflow at the function read_string in utilities/pspp-dump-sav.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: pspp package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
